mapper.select: select * from sys_meter_reading_record where type = #{type} and data_status = 1 order by create_date desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_meter_reading_record( consumption, type, unit, recording_quantity, start_date, end_date, data_status, bill_status, create_date )value ( #{consumption}, #{type}, #{unit}, #{recordingQuantity}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{dataStatus}, #{billStatus}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: update sys_meter_reading_data set quantity = #{quantity}, update_date = #{updateDate} where type = #{type} and #{quantity} > quantity
mapper.select: select sum(indoor_area) as area_totals from cpm_building_unit_estate where id in #{item}
select *,DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y%m') as months from sys_meter_reading_record where id = #{meterReadingRecordId}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_meter_reading_share( meter_reading_record_id, months, totals, unit, unit_price, type, cost, household_consumption, household_area, household_cost, share_unit_price, charge_unit, household_share_cost, additional_costs, rate, effective_time_start, effective_time_end, remakes, create_id, create_date )value ( #{meterReadingRecordId}, #{months}, #{totals}, #{unit}, #{unitPrice}, #{type}, #{cost}, #{householdConsumption}, #{householdArea}, #{householdCost}, #{shareUnitPrice}, #{chargeUnit}, #{householdShareCost}, #{additionalCosts}, #{rate}, #{effectiveTimeStart}, #{effectiveTimeEnd}, #{remakes}, #{createId}, #{createDate} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id

insert into sys_meter_reading_share_details( share_bill_id, estate_id, house_area, amount_payable, paid_amount, remaining_unpaid_amount, status, rate, payment_period, create_id, create_date )value ( #{shareBillId}, #{estateId}, #{houseArea}, #{amountPayable}, #{paidAmount}, #{remainingUnpaidAmount}, #{status}, #{rate}, #{paymentPeriod}, #{createId}, #{createDate} )
mapper.select: select smrsd.*,CONCAT(cb.no,'-',cbu.no,'-',cbue.room_number) as room_name,GROUP_CONCAT(ur.name) as residents from sys_meter_reading_share_details as smrsd,cpm_building_unit as cbu, cpm_building as cb,cpm_building_unit_estate as cbue LEFT JOIN cpm_resident_estate as cre on cbue.id = cre.building_unit_estate_id LEFT JOIN user_resident as ur on cre.resident_id = ur.id where smrsd.estate_id = cbue.id and cbue.building_unit_id = cbu.id and cbu.building_id = cb.id and smrsd.share_bill_id = #{shareBillId} GROUP BY smrsd.id
select sum(paid_amount) from sys_meter_reading_share_details where share_bill_id = #{id}
select sum(remaining_unpaid_amount) from sys_meter_reading_share_details where share_bill_id = #{id}
select count((case status = 3 when true then 0 else 1 end)) from sys_meter_reading_share_details where share_bill_id = #{id}
